game

Class NPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Characters
      • game.NPC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NPC
extends Characters
implements java.io.Serializable
    An NPC is a character that can interact with a player by talking to them. NPC's can be static or follow a given route
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • NPC

        public NPC(java.lang.String[] image,
   java.lang.String name,
   boolean isMoveable,
   int x,
   int y,
   Player.Direction[] p,
   java.lang.String speech)
        Creates a new NPC with the given Sprite Set, name, position, route, speech and whether it is movable
        Parameters:
        image - Sprite Set
        name - NPC name
        isMoveable - Is NPC movable
        x - X position
        y - Y position
        p - Path NPC will follow
        speech - String said when NPC speaks

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g,
        int startRow,
        int startCol)
        Draws the npc with the image for the direction and where they currently are.
        Parameters:
        g - - graphics to draw the npc to
        startRow - row to draw from relative to the player
        startCol - column to draw from relative to the player
